snippet.title: Zoomageddon - Alpha Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Play as an orange cat in a post-apocalyptic world where you collect Mighty Beasts abilities and challenge the Rat King. Inspired by Vampire Survivors, a game that started the Bullet-heaven genre, Zoomageddon is a unique blend of bullet-heaven and base-building mechanics set in a world teeming with mutant animals. As Oyen the cat, uncover the mysteries of Zoomageddon, unlock various buildings, and discover new quirky powers.

The twelve Chinese zodiacs are subtly woven into the story. Each boss Oyen faces represents one of these zodiac animals, adding an intriguing layer of mystery and challenge to his mission!

Key Features
- Bullet Heaven Combat: Engage in fast-paced, action-packed gameplay reminiscent of Vampire Survivors.
- Base Building & Procedurally-Generated Dungeon Crawling: Create and customize your base while delving into endless dungeons with unique challenges.
- Narrative Storyline with Eastern Zodiac Lore: Discover the story behind each zodiac sign, including the epic tale of how the Rat earned its spot by betraying the Cat.
- Mighty Beasts Abilities: Collect and utilize unique powers from various beasts you encounter.

Wishlist Now!
Prepare for an unforgettable adventure in Zoomageddon! Add it to your wishlist now and be the first to know about updates and the official release in Q3/Q4 2025
